products.title: Affinity Sandstone Roller Blind
products.metadescription: With its lovely, natural colour palette, the affinity sandstone roller blind brings all the warmth your home needs.   The woven design is picked out in sandy tones, with hints of cool grey adding interesting texture and character to the delightful design.   From the harlequin add
